channel.title: Hey there, I'm Savannah! on Savannah Ostrowski
channel.description: Recent content in Hey there, I'm Savannah! on Savannah Ostrowski

item.title: Appearances + Articles
item.description: Conference Talks GitHub Universe 2022 - Azure Developer CLI: GitHub to cloud in minutes: currently on the GitHub Universe site (registration is free but required until it’s up on YouTube) Blog Posts + Articles Azure Dev Tools blog (topics: Azure Developer CLI) Microsoft Python blog (topics: Pylance + Python Developer Experience) Microsoft Research Blog: Experimentation Platform: Measurably improve your product by combining qualitative and quantitative methods Livestreams + Recordings Introducing the Azure Developer CLI (azd) | Azure Friday Azure Developer CLI - a faster way to get started on Azure with Azure Cosmos DB Accelerate cloud development in VS Code PyCon 2021 Demo - Supercharging your Python Development with Pylance in Visual Studio Code Podcasts The Real Python Podcast: Using Pylance to Write Better Python Inside of Visual Studio Code The UX Pursuit Podcast: Why developer experience is user experience
item.content:
Conference Talks

  • GitHub Universe 2022 - Azure Developer CLI: GitHub to cloud in minutes: currently on the GitHub Universe site (registration is free but required until it’s up on YouTube)

Blog Posts + Articles

  • Azure Dev Tools blog (topics: Azure Developer CLI)
  • Microsoft Python blog (topics: Pylance + Python Developer Experience)
  • Microsoft Research Blog: Experimentation Platform: Measurably improve your product by combining qualitative and quantitative methods

Livestreams + Recordings

  • Introducing the Azure Developer CLI (azd) | Azure Friday
  • Azure Developer CLI - a faster way to get started on Azure with Azure Cosmos DB
  • Accelerate cloud development in VS Code
  • PyCon 2021 Demo - Supercharging your Python Development with Pylance in Visual Studio Code

Podcasts

  • The Real Python Podcast: Using Pylance to Write Better Python Inside of Visual Studio Code
  • The UX Pursuit Podcast: Why developer experience is user experience
